hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir:A man was buried with my father. I had a desire at heart for that (place for my burial). So I took him out after six months. I did not find any change (in his body) except a few hair that touched the earth

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي تَحْوِيلِ الْمَيِّتِ مِنْ مَوْضِعِهِ لِلأَمْرِ يَحْدُثُ
chapter.eng-name: Moving The Deceased From His Burial Site Because Of Something That Happened
